name: Coleman Xcursion Stand-Up Grill
description: Flex your grilling muscles. The Xcursion's wheeled legs can be pulled to your lunch location and elevate the grill to the perfect height, without the need of a table. It sets up in minutes for front-country camping, picnics, or backyard grilling.2 independently adjustable burners let you grill steaks or boil lots of water.Even-Temp™ technology ensures even heat distribution.Large, 1840sq.cm cast iron cooking surface.Water pan grease catch cleans up easily.Single side table holds utensils or ingredients.Scissor leg stand is simple to set up and collapse.
